body:
Inspired by the Avicus Choice Awards, I've decided to create a discussion giving a superlative to everybody.

Only rule is: your superlative must start with "Most Likely to…" and it pretty much goes without saying that it shouldn't be profane, inappropriate, and/or immoral.

Otherwise, go ahead!
body_tagged:

Otherwise, go ahead!
